stimulusHtml: Quick-to-See Smith's inclusion of cheap trinkets is intended to

features.html: Courtesy of the Artist and the Accola Griefen Gallery, NY

choicesHtml: emphasize that most popular American sports are variations of Native American traditions
reference a history of exploitative economic transactions between Native Americans and Europeans
expose the low wages of Native American workers who labor in factories to mass-produce such goods
critique the art market's obsession with the skill and craftsmanship of American art
